Headline: Red and Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: Red & Purple Line Express Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Wilson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red and Purple Line Express Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Wilson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Damen, Roscoe, Western, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Damen, Roscoe, Western, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hoyne.

Allow extra travel time.
